features: CARVES OUT THE SHARPEST LINES: It’s a clear shave gel and non-foaming! You know what that means… you get to see where you’re going, so you can create the sharp, clean lines and precision edge-ups. Leave the guesswork to shaving foam users, your skin deserves the feel of confidence and certainty. If you’ve never had the luxury of using clear shaving gel before, get ready for an unparalleled experience!
THE SMOOTHEST GLIDE: Most users prefer to apply this shaving gel on dry skin! Either way, you or your customers’ shave will be smooth and clean. No rash, no burns, no clogged blades.

FRESH, CLEAN SCENT: There’s nothing worse than a shave soap with a pungent smell! Mane Tame Vintage Shaving Gel is gently scented with mint, citrus, wood, musk and amber tones – an excellent blend of sophisticated beast mode!
Made in the USA! – Tested in professional barbershops, produced in the USA (Los Angeles, California to be exact), our Vintage Shaving Gel is homegrown and made with safe ingredients, love and care.

SENSITIVE SKIN NUTRITION – HYDRATES AND NOURISHES: Foams and shave creams can dry out your pores. We’ve taken our Gel one step further and enriched it with Aloe Vera, Tea Tree Oil and Vitamin E. Reduces inflammation while leaving skin cool and fresh. Minimize the need for after-shave. Hydrate+Moisturize+Protect.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mane Tame Professional Men's Grooming We create products for a new generation of men who care as much about their appearance as they do the intangible core values that they define themselves by. We create products with passion and enthusiasm for our customers. We do this not for the simple fact that they buy from us; but, rather that they value performance. As a lifestyle brand, we understand that grooming products are more than just ingredients in a bottle or jar. Styling hair and/or maintaining a healthy beard is part of the process in which a man makes a decision to be the best version of himself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't say enough - stop reading and buy this!
reviews.reviewText: I grow a beard during the cooler months, and I prefer to have clean, defined beard lines. I purchased this after visiting the barber and realizing they use a clear shave gel to see what they're doing - no more guessing!I pair this with a beard shaping tool (mine was purchased branded as Beard Ninja, but there's lots of clones out there that do the same thing) and a double-sided safety razor. Combined with those two things, I have the cleanest beard lines ever!This product smells great and provides a great glide. I usually wash my face with Clean & Clear, pat dry, then while my face is slightly damp I'll fill my palm with a FULL pump. That full pump is enough to cover my entire face.My *only* slight complaint is I feel I may use more of this product compared to shave foam, since the foam expands so much and you always feel like you have more than you need. With this product, you might pump it a few more times but you're able to only use what you need, though you may end up purchasing it more often. ​I liked it so much that I purchased another set as a gift for a buddy of mine and he loves it too! Highly recommend and will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This gel is very well lubricated, stays lubricated when using it, and smells really good. I was worried while reading the reviews of many gel products but I have not one qualm with this one. Absolutely perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Merchandise arrived fast and as described
reviews.reviewText: Merchandise arrived fast and as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! A shaving gel that works
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and have spent many years and a lot of money buying dozens of different products hoping to find a shaving gel that worked for my skin. Unfortunately nothing I tried would give me a nice smooth shave without any razor burn, irritation or bleeding, until I found Mane Tame! This shaving gel is thicker than your average shaving cream (which for me is a good thing) and doesn’t foam up and stays clear so you can easily see where you are shaving or need to line up your beard/mustache. Also it smells great and leaves your skin feeling soft after. I would definitely recommend this to anyone with sensitive skin or anyone who want to try something different than regular shaving cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thank you for listening to your reviews and changing the bottle design. Great product has become even more pleasurable to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For a second I thought I was a professional barber.
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for the first time today with my straight razor and wow...what a difference. The smell and texture is really good. Right now I am using the gel with my straight razor to line my mustache and sideburns. I am happy to note that I got no nice or cuts. This really worked well with my straight razor because it is clear and I could see what I was doing. That and because the gel forms a ‘shield or protective surface’ between the blade and my skin and allowed the razor to glide across those areas. I am a beginner with the straight razor so trust me when I say I needed some forgiveness. I did not get that ease of use with my other fine shave soaps/creams.The gel left a refreshing feeling at the end of the shave. My skin felt healthy and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband loves the product but the pump head is always a bad quality. First time we are receiving a bad pump though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, works well
reviews.reviewText: It's a good product. Goes on easy and smells ok. However, doesn't really matter how good it is if it is always " currently unavailable ". And Customer Service didn't respond to my enquiry. Business needs to do much better.
